headline: Heatwave likely over parts of Northwest India
description: Maximum temperatures likely to be 4-6Â°C above normal at isolated places over Punjab, Haryana & Delhi.
instruction: Stay hydrated; avoid strenuous outdoor activity in afternoons.

headline: Very Severe Cyclonic Storm over Bay of Bengal: Coastal Andhra & Odisha alert
description: Very severe cyclonic storm likely to intensify and move north-northeastward towards Odisha coast.
instruction: Evacuate low-lying areas; secure loose objects. Follow local authority instructions.

headline: Heavy to very heavy rainfall at isolated places over Kerala
description: Heavy to very heavy rainfall likely at isolated places over Kerala during next 24 hours.
instruction: Avoid flood-prone areas. Do not attempt crossing flooded roads.

headline: Dust storm expected over parts of Rajasthan
description: Gusty winds with dust raising reducing visibility over isolated pockets.
instruction: Protect eyes and respiratory tract; keep windows closed.

headline: Flood alert for low-lying parts of Assam near Brahmaputra
description: Water levels in the Brahmaputra at certain gauge stations are rising and expected to cross danger level.
instruction: Move to higher ground; avoid rivers/embankments.

headline: Cold wave conditions likely in parts of Himachal Pradesh
description: Night temperature to fall significantly over higher reaches.
instruction: Keep warm; check on elderly and infants.
